sourcesContent:
import { Text, Img, Heading } from "./.."; import React from "react"; export default function ProductDetail1({ productLabel = "UMKM", productName = "Service Laptop Asus, Lenovo, MSI, Apple", productPrice = "Rp2.000.000", locationText = "Kota Bandung", ratingText = "4.6", soldCount = "Terjual 100", additionalLabel = "Non PKP", ...props }) { return (
{productLabel}
{productName} {productPrice}
{locationText}
{ratingText}
{soldCount}
{additionalLabel}
); }
